name: ListAgentPoolUpdates
description:
Retrieve all updates for a specific agent pool.

Use this tool to get a list of all updates related to a specific agent pool in Okta. It provides details on changes or modifications to the agent pool identified by the provided pool ID.

parameters.name: agent_pool_id
parameters.description: ID of the agent pool to retrieve updates for.

value_schema.description: ID of the agent pool for which the settings apply to

parameters.name: return_scheduled_or_adhoc
parameters.description: Return only scheduled or ad-hoc updates if true. If false or not provided, returns the full list of updates.

value_schema.description: Return only scheduled or ad-hoc updates. If this parameter isn't provided, Okta returns the entire list of updates.
